phrases: Are you satisfied running with the friends you finally made?
Are you satisfied holding hands and running around with your little friends?!
You are always ruining someone else's efforts.
You do not see your teammates!
I do not know if you are just naturally talented,
but if you think you alone will manage somehow, you are wrong!
Do not forget that we are here.
Get your stuff on the bus!
We will show you just how serious we are at the qualifier.
You first-years will be too busy with chores to watch the race.
Start by becoming regulars on your team.
Your time has not even improved by ten seconds!
What kind of training have you been doing?
Are not you a scholarship student?
Your only option is to do well at running.
The same goes for the rest of you.
I will not allow any weakness!
You won with a huge lead.
You must be a top runner nationally, as well.
You can really see the results of your coaching.
I am just blessed with talented runners.
We are looking forward to this year's prefectural and national races.
I hope we can meet your expectations.
Apparently, they want me to speak at a party about fostering athletes.
I have asked the coaches to manage your training schedule, so do not worry.
It is all thanks to what you have achieved.
Do not damage Sendai Josei High School's dignity!
We will be doing high-altitude training.
We will be able to enjoy the scenery.
The ground seems like it will be gentle on our knees.
Cannot you come up with a better excuse?
Everyone has an injury or two they are working through.
Runners improve their times despite them.
I will be cutting everyone who does not do well.
Tell him he only needs to try when he is watching.
He will not listen to me.
After all, he is a scholarship student.
I do not think you have to run.
Have you ever suffered an injury?
Those bags are full of meat.
You are on bathroom duty tonight.
Quit surrounding Hana, you sweaty pigs!
Is not it a little soon for you to be tired?
My special crunchy liver and leek stir fry contains tons of vegetables!
They are making me feel great.
Do you want to quit the team?
If you cannot be useful here, you will not be useful anywhere.
Your life will be decided here.
I do not know how fast you were in the boonies,
but here we coach based on years of theory.
If you cannot keep up, it is because you are not good enough.
You do not get it, do you?
Imagine you are racing for your life!
Do not forget that you are representing a prestigious school!
Leave behind those who cannot run!
We do not have time for them!
This time, I do not think I will be able to.
You cannot close the gap that quickly.
Everyone is pouring their blood, sweat, and tears into practice
every day while you are resting.
The team will manage without you.
Get yourself healed up and find a new path.
I am here on a track scholarship!
If I quit the team, I will not have anything!
Please let me back on the team!
I am sorry I got injured!
I only have time for students who can run.
He asked you to lead Group B since we are splitting into two groups.
It would be a waste not to see this.
You knew the morning after I first stayed at Aotake
that I was from Sendai Josei High School.
A quick search online revealed just how good a runner you were.
That you were a nationally top-ranked runner by your second year,
and that your records suddenly stopped the spring of your third year.
But that is all I know.
There was no need for me to investigate any further.
I cannot because the team any more trouble than I have already.
When that reporter spoke to me, I felt like I had woken up from a dream.
I realized no matter how far I run, I am still me.
If you are going to talk, why not tell everyone?
No matter what happens, we are still us.
Sorry you had to bathe last.
You cleaned it again for me, did not you?
Yuki told me to use my head.
Your seniors can teach you all kinds of things.
Kakeru, do you have a girlfriend?
Well, the night sky was just so pretty.
I hated my high school track team.
My coach's methods, the stuffy air of that club room...
I hated it so much, it made me want to puke.
I broke my coach's nose, lost my college recommendation,
Since the school wanted to keep it quiet, they imposed restrictions on the team.
The summer of my third year,
none of my classmates were able to participate in meets.
what happened to that first-year was just an opportunity for me
to release all my pent-up anger and achieve some self-satisfaction.
It is no wonder they hate me.
Because of a moment's decision, I wasted three years of their effort.
That is why he hates you so much.
It is no wonder he hates me.
I became unable to see anything but myself.
That is what I am afraid of.
I am worried I might do something similar again.
I was nearly unable to stop myself again.
You have been hesitant about running because you were worried about that?
But you had a reason, right?
A reason you had to do it.
It is not good to use violence against another person, though.
Before I because any more trouble for you guys...
We will not let you bail on us now.
If anything, I am glad to know.
We more or less already knew that you tend to act before you speak.
If anything, I cannot believe you were worried about that.
Do not the rest of you?
It is hard to say yes when you are asked face-to-face.
I was captivated by the way you ran.
I could not believe someone could have such pure running form.
I thought you might already know the answer I was seeking.
But I still have not found the answer.
The more I run, the more difficult I realize it is.
Do not you feel the same way?
I have fun running with you!
In fact, I have more fun than Jota!
I was just speaking my mind.
I enjoy running with you guys, from the bottom of my heart.
Kakeru, the goal is still far ahead.
All right, that concludes our meeting.
You do not need to apologize.
Thank you for believing in me.
In the Hakone Ekiden with this team!
Let us aim for the top together.
Starting now, I am serious about it!
Kakeru's finally ready to take things seriously.
He said he is serious about running at Hakone starting now.
Then what have we been doing until now?
Next time: You are Not Alone.
Next time: You are Not Alone
